description: Raihan`s Goodra battled against Ash`s Gengar in the match that featured Masters Eight on the line. It was the second Pok√©mon Raihan sent out after Raihan`s Flygon was defeated. It used Rain Dance to make the weather on the battlefield be rainy. It was able to knock out Ash`s Dynamaxed Gengar but it ended up being knocked out at the same time.
name: Numelgon (Kibana)
